<Window x:Class="DataGridBugTest.Window1"
        xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
        xmlns:datagrid="http://schemas.microsoft.com/wpf/2008/toolkit"
        xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml">
    
    <Window.Resources>
        <Style TargetType="{x:Type Button}">
            <Setter Property="Margin"
                    Value="4" />
        </Style>
    </Window.Resources>
    
    <Grid>
        <datagrid:DataGrid>
            <datagrid:DataGrid.Columns>
                <datagrid:DataGridTextColumn Header="ColumnA" />
            </datagrid:DataGrid.Columns>
        </datagrid:DataGrid>
    </Grid>
</Window>
Â 
The code above will cause the DataGrid to keep spacing its columns indefinitely.
WorkItem.Summary: Setting Margin Property On Default Button Style Causes DataGrid to Hang Indefinitely
